      Methods in main with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean Ship.addItem​(Item item)
      Adds the item to the ship's storage if it can
      boolean StorageList.addItem​(Item item)
      Adds the item to the list.
      boolean Ship.hasItem​(Item item)
      Checks if the item is on the ship
      boolean StorageList.hasItem​(Item item)
      Checks to see if the StorageList already has the item.
      boolean Ship.hasSpace​(Item item)
      Checks of the ship has enough space on in any relevant storage bay to add the item.
      boolean Ship.removeItem​(Item item)
      Remove the item from storage if the ship has the item
      boolean StorageList.removeItem​(Item item)
      Removes an item from the storage list.
      boolean StorageList.validateAdd​(Item item)
      Checks to see if we can add item to this storage list, given space and item type
